Documentation.long_help: This filter computes a surface from a subset of points in the input that comprise a percentile according to one of the point-associated scalar arrays.
Documentation.short_help: This filter computes a surface from a subset of points in the input that comprise a percentile according to one of the point-associated scalar arrays.

StringVectorProperty.name: SelectInputScalars
StringVectorProperty.label: Point Scalars to Use for Percentile
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set point scalar field to use to calculate the percentile. The points will be sorted according to this scalar field in ascending order and the first percentile of points will be retained.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Percentile
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the desired percentile of points.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: MaximumEdgeLength
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The maximum size of a tetrahedra edge in the output dataset.
